Now, implementing the heap with these operations. 

The heap can be an array, with the following functions:

struct Heap {
    int *array;
    int size;
    int capacity;
};

void initHeap(struct Heap *h, int capacity) {
    h->array = (int*)malloc(capacity * sizeof(int));
    h->size = 0;
    h->capacity = capacity;
}

void swap(int *a, int *b) {
    int t = *a;
    *a = *b;
    *b = t;
}

void heapifyUp(struct Heap *h, int index) {
    int parent = (index-1)/2;
    if (index > 0 && h->array[index] < h->array[parent]) {
        swap(&h->array[index], &h->array[parent]);
        heapifyUp(h, parent);
    }
}

void heapifyDown(struct Heap *h, int index) {
    int smallest = index;
    int left = 2*index +1;
    int right = 2*index +2;
    if (left < h->size && h->array[left] < h->array[smallest])
        smallest = left;
    if (right < h->size && h->array[right] < h->array[smallest])
        smallest = right;
    if (smallest != index) {
        swap(&h->array[index], &h->array[smallest]);
        heapifyDown(h, smallest);
    }
}

void push(struct Heap *h, int value) {
    if (h->size == h->capacity) {
        // Need to resize, but for simplicity, assume capacity is sufficient
        // Or handle error
    }
    h->array[h->size] = value;
    heapifyUp(h, h->size);
    h->size++;
}

int pop(struct Heap *h) {
    if (h->size <=0) return -1; // error
    int root = h->array[0];
    h->array[0] = h->array[h->size-1];
    h->size--;
    heapifyDown(h, 0);
    return root;
}

int size(struct Heap *h) {
    return h->size;
}
